General.Name: Sonmez Filament Sentetik Iplik ve Elyaf Sanayi AS
General.Description: Sönmez Filament Sentetik Iplik ve Elyaf Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells yarns and fibers in Turkey. It offers poy, flat, uniform, twisted, and painted yarns for the automotive industry, as well as high flap yarns. The company also leases properties. Sönmez Filament Sentetik Iplik ve Elyaf Sanayi A.S. was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Bursa, Turkey.
